instinct_candidates.title: Pipeline shell scripts use bash with set -euo pipefail
instinct_candidates.trigger: When creating or editing shell scripts in the pipeline/ directory
instinct_candidates.action: Include `set -euo pipefail` at the top and use explicit error handling. Follow the pattern established in pipeline/04_generate_tiles.sh.

instinct_candidates.title: Frontend uses JSX with React (not TypeScript)
instinct_candidates.trigger: When working on frontend components in frontend/src/
instinct_candidates.action: Use .jsx file extensions and plain JavaScript React patterns, not TypeScript. The project uses App.jsx as the main entry point.
